src_original: 168.004. tasya mātulaḥ paṇyamādāya deśāntaraṃ gataḥ/  168.004. tena śrutam yathā mama bhaginī sattvavatī saṃvṛttā/  168.005. sā bhagavatā vyākṛtā--putraṃ janayiṣyati,  kulamuddyoyiṣyati,  divyāmānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyati,
tgt_original: 時火生童子大舅，先將財物貿易他方，聞妹有娠心生歡喜，世尊與記當必生男，光隆家族，廣說如上，乃至得果。

src_original: mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyatīti/  168.006. sa paṇyaṃ visarjayitvā pratipaṇyamādāya rājagṛhamāgataḥ/
tgt_original: 遂即易己財貨，更收餘物歸王舍城，聞妹已死便作是念：

src_original: 168.007. tena śrutam yathā sā asmākaṃ bhaginī kālagateti/  168.008. śrutvā ca punaḥ saṃlakṣayati--bhagavatā asau vyākṛtā putraṃ janayiṣyati,
tgt_original: 「世尊授記生男得果，豈虛妄耶？

src_original: 168.010. tena tiraḥprātiveśyāḥ pṛṣṭāh--śrutaṃ mayā asmākaṃ bhaginī sattvavatī saṃvṛttā/  168.011. sā bhagavatā vyākṛtā putraṃ janayiṣyati,  kulamuddyotayiṣyati,  divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyati,  mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṃ sākṣātkariṣyatīti/
tgt_original: 「我妹懷胎，蒙佛授記宿懷歡喜。

src_original: 168.013. śrutvā vayaṃ parituṣṭāḥ/  168.013. sā ca śrūyate mṛtā kālagateti/  168.014. mā haiva bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ vitathaṃ syāditi/
tgt_original: 今聞身死乖本希望，寧容世尊言非是實？

src_original: 168.019. kathaṃ bhagavato bhāṣitaṃ vitathaṃ bhaviṣyati?  kiṃ tu tena svāmināpi asau tathā tathā upakrāntā,  yathā kālagatā/  168.020. sa dārako maharddhiko mahānubhāvaḥ/  168.021. agninā na dagdhaḥ/
tgt_original: 「然佛大師言無虛妄，但由彼聟用外道言，枉殺令死，所生孩子有大威神，處炎火中身無傷損。

src_original: 168.021. adyāpi rājakule saṃvardhata iti/
tgt_original: 今時長養，現在王宮。

src_original: 168.021. sa subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati--na yuktaṃ gṛhapate tvayā kṛtam/
tgt_original: 」舅聞是語往善賢長者處，相問訊已，報言： 「長者汝為非理。 」答曰：

src_original: 168.022. kiṃ kṛtam? asmākaṃ sattvavatī bhaginī tvayā nirgranthavigrāhitena tathā tathā upakrāntā,  yathā kālagatā/  168.023. sa dārako maharddhiko mahānubhāvaḥ/  168.023. agnināpi na dagdhaḥ/
tgt_original: 「我何所作？ 」「汝用外道惡見人言，我妹有娠枉殺令死，所生孩子有大威神，處炎火中身無燒損。

src_original: 168.024. adyāpi rājakule saṃvardhate/
tgt_original: 今時長養現在王宮。

src_original: 168.024. tadgatametat/
tgt_original: 此事既爾且不須說。

src_original: 168.024. yadi tāvatkumārabhānayasi,  ityevaṃ kuśalam/  168.025. no cedvayaṃ tvāṃ jñātimadhyādutkṣipāmaḥ/  168.025. salokānām {sālohitānām?  } saṃkāraṃ pātayāmaḥ,
tgt_original: 若將兒來我當容恕，若不爾者我當總集所有鄉親，擯斥於汝。

src_original: rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu cāvaraṇaṃ niścārayāmah--asmākaṃ bhaginī subhadreṇa gṛhapatinā praghātitā/
tgt_original: 以籌置地數汝無知，於街衢處唱汝惡響：

src_original: 168.027. strīghātako 'yam/  168.027. na kenacidābhāṣitavyamiti/  168.027. rājakule ca te 'narthaṃ kārayāma iti/
tgt_original: 我妹無過善賢枉殺，害女人者不應共語，於法官處以罪相刑。

src_original: 168.028. sa śrutvā vyathitaḥ/
tgt_original: 」長者聞已生大憂苦，便作是念：

src_original: 168.028. yathaiṣa paribhāṣate,  nūnamevaṃ karomīti viditvā rājñaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati--deva,
tgt_original: 「如說苦詞必不相放。 」便詣影勝王所禮足，白言：

src_original: 168.032. strīghātako 'yam/  168.032. rājakule ca te 'narthaṃ kārayāma iti/  169.001. <169>tadarhasi jyotiṣkaṃ kumāraṃ dātumiti/
tgt_original: 具說前事，乃至以罪相刑，唯願垂恩放出童子。

src_original: 169.001. rājā kathayati--gṛhapate,
tgt_original: 」王曰：

src_original: na mayā tvatsakāśāt jyotiṣkaḥ kumāro gṛhītaḥ,  kiṃ tu bhagavatā mama nyastaḥ/
tgt_original: 「我不從汝得童子來，是佛世尊親授於我。

src_original: 169.002. yadi tvaṃ kumāreṇārthī,
tgt_original: 汝若須者可往問佛。

src_original: bhagavatsakāśaṃ gaccheti/  169.002. sa bhagavatsakāśaṃ gataḥ/  169.003. pādayor nipatya kathayati--bhagavan,
tgt_original: 」長者即便往詣佛所，禮雙足已白言： 「世尊！

src_original: mama jñātaya evaṃ paribhāṣante--yadi tāvat kumāramānayasītyevaṃ kuśalam/  169.004. no cedānayasi,  vayaṃ tvāṃ jñātimadhyādutkṣipāmaḥ,  saṃkāraṃ pātayāmaḥ,
tgt_original: 我有親屬苦相責及，廣說其語，乃至以罪相刑，願佛慈悲與我童子。

src_original: 169.005. asmākaṃ bhaginī subhadreṇa gṛhapatinā praghātitā/  169.006. strīghātako 'yam/
tgt_original: 「若此長者不得兒者，便嘔熱血以取命終。

src_original: 169.006. rājakule cānarthaṃ kārayāma iti/  169.007. tadarhasi jyotiṣkaṃ kumāraṃ dāpayitumiti/
tgt_original: 「汝今可往影勝王處，并將長者，汝傳我語願王無病，報言：

src_original: evaṃ ca vada--anuprayaccha mahārāja subhadrasya gṛhapaterjyotiṣkaṃ kumāram/
tgt_original: 可還長者火生童子。

src_original: 169.010. yadi subhadro gṛhapatirjyotiṣkaṃ kumāraṃ na labhate,  sthānametadvidyate yaduṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyatīti/
tgt_original: 若彼長者不得童子，必嘔熱血以取命終。

src_original: 169.012. evaṃ bhadantetyāyuṣmānānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yena rājā bimbisārastenopasaṃskrāntaḥ/
tgt_original: 』」是時尊者阿難陀，具傳佛教詣王白知。

src_original: 169.013. upasaṃkramya rājānaṃ bimbisārametadavocat--bhagavāṃste mahārāja ārogyayati,  kathayati ca--anuprayaccha mahārāja subhadrasya gṛhapaterjyotiṣkaṃ kumāram/
tgt_original: 王言：

src_original: sthānametadvidyate yat subhadro gṛhapatiruṣṇaṃ śoṇitaṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣye/  169.016. rājā kathayati--vande bhadantānanda buddhaṃ bhagavantam/  169.016. yathā bhagavānājñāpayati tathā kariṣye/
tgt_original: 為我畔睇世尊足下，如佛所教我當奉行。

src_original: 169.017. ārogyamityuktā āyuṣmānānandaḥ prakrāntaḥ/
tgt_original: 」時阿難陀： 「願王無病。 」辭之而去。

src_original: 169.017. rājā bimbisāraḥ kathayati--gṛhapate,
tgt_original: 王告長者曰：

src_original: mayā ayaṃ kumāraḥ saṃvardhitaḥ/  169.018. priyaśca me manāpaśca/  169.018. samayato 'haṃ muñcāmi,  yadi māṃ divase divase triṣkālaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāmatīti/  169.019. sa kathayati--deva upasaṃkramiṣyati/
tgt_original: 「我承佛教養此童子，情甚憐愛，共作要期然後放出，日別三時來見我者隨意將去。

src_original: sa rājñā sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitaṃ kṛtvā hastiskandha āropya visarjitaḥ//
tgt_original: 」時王即便令著上衣具服瓔珞，載以香象送至其家。

src_original: 169.022. ācaritametallokasya--na tāvat putrasya nāma prajñāyate yāvat pitā jīvati/
tgt_original: 人間常事，若父在者子名不彰。

src_original: 169.022. yāvadapareṇa samayena subhadro gṛhapatiḥ kālagataḥ/  169.023. jyotiṣkaḥ kumāraḥ svagṛhe pratiṣṭhitaḥ/  169.023. sa buddhe 'bhiprasanno dharme saṃghe 'bhiprasannaḥ/  169.024. buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ/  169.024. tena yasmin pradeśe tena subhadreṇa patnī āghātitā,  tasmin pradeśe vihāraṃ kārayitvā sarvāpakaraṇasampūrṇaścāturdiśāryabhikṣusaṃghāya niryātitaḥ/
tgt_original: 後長者死，火生童子自知家務，於三寶所深起敬心，便於其父害母之地造立僧房，受用資具無不充足，施與四方一切僧眾，名曰蹂腹林。

src_original: 169.026. tathā sthavirairapi sūtrānta upanibaddham--bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati mṛditakukṣike dāva iti//
tgt_original: 是故經云： 「佛在王舍城住蹂腹林。

src_original: 169.028. subhadrasya gṛhapateḥ pauruṣeyā ye paṇyamādāya deśāntaraṃ gatāḥ,  taiḥ śrutam--subhadro gṛhapatiḥ kālagataḥ/  169.029. jyotiṣkaḥ kumāraḥ svagṛhe pratiṣṭhitaḥ/  169.029. sa buddhe 'bhiprasanno dharme saṃghe 'bhiprasanno buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dharmaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gata iti/  169.030. teṣāṃ ca gośīrṣacananamayaṃ pātraṃ saṃpannam/
tgt_original: 」時善賢長者曾遣商人他方興易，彼聞長者今已身亡，火生童子代知家業，於三寶所敬心彌著，商人多獲牛頭栴檀上妙之鉢，便持一鉢盛滿珍寶，遣使送與火生。

src_original: 169.031. tena taddīrghe stambhe āropya sthāpitam/
tgt_original: 彼既得已置高幢上，宣令普告：

src_original: 169.032. ghaṇḍāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritam--nedaṃ kenacit viṣṭayā vā <170>śītayā vā karkaṭakena vā gṛhītavyam/  170.001. ya etacchramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā maharddhiko vā mahānubhāvah ṛddhyā gṛhṇāti,
tgt_original: 「若有諸人，不用梯隥而取此鉢，或是沙門婆羅門，有大威力神通自在而取得者，我以此鉢施與其人。

src_original: tasyedam yathāsukhamiti/  170.002. tīrthyāḥ kalyamevotthāya tīrthyasparśanaṃ gacchanti/
tgt_original: 」時諸外道晨朝起已，出行澡浴，見高幢已告長者曰：

src_original: 170.003. dṛṣṭvā ca punarjyotiṣkasya gṛhapateḥ kathayanti--gṛhapate,
tgt_original: 時有眾多耆宿苾芻，入城乞食見彼高幢，咸問長者：

src_original: kimetaditi?
tgt_original: 「此是何物？

src_original: tena tathaiva vistareṇa samākhyātam/  170.007. te kathayanti--gṛhapate,
tgt_original: 」彼便具答，苾芻報曰：

src_original: kiṃ pātramātrasyārthāyātmānaṃ saṃprakāśayāmah?
tgt_original: 「我豈為鉢自顯己能。

src_original: uktaṃ bhagavatā--pracchannakalyāṇairvo bhikṣavo vihartavyaṃ dhūtapāpairityuktvā prakrāntāḥ/
tgt_original: 如佛所言： 『覆善彰惡是出家行。 』」捨之而去。

src_original: 170.008. yāvadāyuṣmān daśabalaḥ kāśyapastamanuprāptaḥ/  170.009. sa pṛcchati--gṛhapate,
tgt_original: 時具壽十力迦攝波，從此而過，亦問長者：

src_original: kimetaditi?
tgt_original: 「此是何物？

src_original: tena yathāvṛttamārocitam/  170.010. āyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapaḥ saṃlakṣayati--yena mayā anādikālopacitaṃ kleśagaṇaṃ vāntaṃ tyaktaṃ charditaṃ pratinisṛṣṭam,
tgt_original: 」彼還具答，于時尊者便作是念： 「我從無始生死已來，所有長養煩惱怨家，我已變吐悉皆棄捨。

src_original: taṃ māṃ gṛhapatistīrthikasādhāraṇayā ṛddhyā āhvayati/  170.012. tadasya manorathaṃ pūrayāmīti/
tgt_original: 我今宜可受彼長者普請因緣，滿其所願。

src_original: 170.012. tena gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhumabhiprasārya tatpātraṃ gṛhītam/
tgt_original: 」即便舒手如香象鼻，至彼幢標取栴檀鉢，持還住處。

src_original: 170.012. sa tadgṛhītvā vihāraṃ gato bhikṣubhirucyate--sthavira,
tgt_original: 苾芻見問：

src_original: kutastava gośīrṣacandanamayaṃ pātramiti?
tgt_original: 「尊者何處得此牛頭栴檀殊勝鉢來？

src_original: tena yathāvṛttamārocitam/  170.014. bhikṣavaḥ kathayanti--sthavira,
tgt_original: 」彼便具以其事告諸苾芻，諸苾芻答曰：

src_original: kalpate tava pātramātrasyārthāya ṛddhiṃ vidarśayitumiti?
tgt_original: 「尊者豈可為斯木鉢現神通耶？

src_original: kathayati--āyuṣmantaḥ,
tgt_original: 」報言： 「具壽！

src_original: kalpatu vā mā vā/  170.015. kṛtamidānīm/  170.015. kiṃ kriyatāmiti?
tgt_original: 合與不合我已作訖，今欲如何？

src_original: etat prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣavo bhagavata ārocayanti/
tgt_original: 」諸苾芻以緣白佛，佛言：

src_original: 170.016. bhagavānāha--na bhikṣuṇā āgārikasya purastāt ṛddhirvidarśayitavyā/  170.017. darśayati, sātisāro bhavati/
tgt_original: 「苾芻不應於俗人前現其神力，若顯現者得越法罪。

src_original: 170.017. api tu catvāri pātrāṇi suvarṇamayaṃ rūpyamayaṃ varḍūryamayaṃ sphaṭikamayam/  170.018. aparāṇyapi catvāri pātrāṇi rītimayaṃ tāmramayaṃ kaṃsamayamabhramayaṃ ca/  170.019. tatra yāni pūrvakāṇi catvāri pātrāṇi,
tgt_original: 然鉢有四種： 金、銀、琉璃、頗梨所成。 復有四鉢： 所謂鍮石、赤銅、白銅、諸木。

src_original: etānyanupasthāpitāni nopasthāpayitavyāni,  170.020. yāni paścimāni catvāri pātrāṇi,  etānyanupasthāpitāni nopasthāpayitavyāni,  uapsthāpitāni tu bhaiṣajyaśaravaparibhogena paribhoktavyāni/
tgt_original: 前之四鉢，若先無者不應輒受，若先有者應須捨棄。 後之四種，若先無者即不應畜，若先有者應作藥盂隨時受用。

src_original: 170.022. api tvadhīṣṭāni te dve pātre āyasaṃ mṛṇmayam/
tgt_original: 合守持鉢有其二種： 謂鐵及瓦，如是應知。

src_original: 170.022. yāvadapareṇa samayena jyotiṣkasya gṛhapaterdivyamānuṣī śrīḥ prādurbhūtā/  170.023. antarā ca rājagṛhamantarā ca campāmatrāntare śulkaśālā/  170.024. tasyāṃ śulkaśālikaḥ kālagataḥ/
tgt_original: 」後於異時，火生童子人天妙相悉皆出現，從占波城乃至王舍，於此中間有輸稅處，稅官身死生藥叉中，遂於夜夢告其子曰：

src_original: 170.024. sa vyālayakṣeṣūpapannaḥ/
tgt_original: 「我身死後生藥叉中，可於某處稅物之所，為我營葺藥叉神堂，於其門前懸一鈴鐸。

src_original: 170.024. tena putrāṇāṃ svapnadarśanaṃ dattam--yaḥ kaścit paṇyamaśulkayitvā gamiṣyati,  sā ghaṇṭā tāvadviraviṣyati yāvadasau nivartya śulkaṃ dāpayitavyamiti (yiṣyatīti?)/
tgt_original: 若有諸人持物過時，不輸稅者鈴便震響，即喚令迴取直放去。

src_original: 170.027. taistaṃ svapnaṃ saṃbandhibāndhavānāṃ nivedya divasatithimuhūrtena tasmin pradeśe yakṣasthānaṃ kāritam/
tgt_original: 」其子他日於諸親族說其夜夢，共觀要處安置神堂外懸鈴鐸。

src_original: 170.028. tatra ca ghaṇṭā baddhvā lambitā//  170.030. campāyāmanyatamo brāhmaṇaḥ/  170.030. tena sadṛśāt kulāt kalatramānītam/
tgt_original: 時占波城有婆羅門妻，遂作是念：

src_original: 170.030. sā brāhmaṇī saṃlakṣayati--ayaṃ brāhmaṇo yaistairupāyairdhanopārjanaṃ karoti/  170.031. ahaṃ bhakṣayāmi/  170.031. na mama pratirūpam yadahamakarmikā tiṣṭheyamiti/
tgt_original: 「此婆羅門隨處經紀，所獲財物我常食用，端拱而坐不事生業是所不應。

src_original: 170.032. tayā vīthīṃ gatvā karpāsaḥ krītaḥ/  171.001. śobhanena kuvindena kārṣāpaṇasahasramūlyā yamalī vāyitā/
tgt_original: 」遂往市中，買取劫貝撚成細縷，於織師處令其好織，直千金錢。

src_original: 171.001. tayā brāhmaṇa uktah--brāhmaṇa,
tgt_original: 既得一雙疊己，報其夫曰：

src_original: asyā yamalyāḥ kārṣāpaṇasahasraṃ mūlyam/  171.002. gṛhītvā vīthīṃ gaccha/
tgt_original: 「此之白疊直千金錢，可往市中賣取其價。 若有買者善。

src_original: 171.002. yadi kaścit yācati,
tgt_original: 若無人問，報曰：

src_original: no cedapattanaṃ ghoṣayitvā anyatra gantavyamiti/
tgt_original: 『市上無人更向餘處。

src_original: 171.003. sa tāṃ gṛhītvā vīthīṃ gataḥ/  171.004. na kaścit kārṣāpaṇasahasreṇa gṛhaṇāti/
tgt_original: 』」其夫持去市中賣之，言索千錢竟無酬價，便即唱言： 「市無人物。

src_original: 171.004. so 'pattanaṃ ghoṣayitvā tām yamalīṃ chatradaṇḍe prakṣipya sārthena sārdhaṃ rājagṛhaṃ saṃprasthito yāvadanupūrveṇa śulkaśālāmanuprāptaḥ/  171.006. śulkāśālikena sārthaḥ śulkitaḥ/  171.006. sa śulkaṃ dattvā saṃprasthitaḥ/  171.006. ghaṇṭā raṭitumārabdhā/
tgt_original: 」即以其疊，內於傘柄竹筩之中，共諸商旅詣王舍城，漸至神堂藥叉稅處，與諸人眾同輸稅已，既欲登途懸鈴響發。

src_original: 171.007. śailkikāḥ kathayanti--bhavantaḥ,
tgt_original: 稅官聞已共相告曰：

src_original: yatheyaṃ ghaṇṭā raṇati,  nūnaṃ sārtho na nipuṇaṃ śulkitaḥ/  171.008. bhūyaḥ śulkayāma iti/
tgt_original: 「鈴既發響，稅物未周，宜更審觀無令脫漏。

src_original: 171.011. yeṣāṃ madhye sa brāhmaṇo nāsti,  te 'tikrāntāḥ/
tgt_original: 」是時稅官分彼商人以為兩處，於一朋中無婆羅門者無聲放去。

src_original: 171.012. anyeṣāṃ gacchatāṃ sā ghaṇṭā tathaiva raṭitumārabdhā/
tgt_original: 彼一朋去，鈴還作聲。

src_original: atithistvam/  172.004. tavaiva pūjā kṛtā bhavati/  172.004. sahasrameva paryacchāmīti/  172.005. tena tasya kārṣāpaṇasahasraṃ dattam/
tgt_original: 「仁是客行，聊申供養無勞減價，總取千錢。

src_original: 172.005. brāhmaṇastamādāya prakrāntaḥ/
tgt_original: 」婆羅門取已歡喜而去。

src_original: 172.005. jyotiṣkeṇa tato yaḥ paribhuktakaḥ sa dārakāya dattaḥ,  aparibhuktakastu snānaśāṭakaḥ kṛtaḥ/
tgt_original: 是時長者將曾用疊與家人著，其未用者自充洗衣。

src_original: 172.006. yāvadapareṇa samayena rājā bimbisāra upariprāsādatalagato 'mātyagaṇaparivṛtastiṣṭhati/  172.007. jyotiṣkasya sa snānaśāṭaka upari gṛhasyābhyavakāśe śoṣito vāyunā hriyamāṇo rājño bimbisārasyopari patitaḥ/
tgt_original: 後於異時，其影勝王與諸大臣昇高閣上，火生長者洗浴之服曬在樓隅，忽被風吹墮在王處。

src_original: 172.009. rājā kathayati--bhavantaḥ,
tgt_original: 王曰：

src_original: 172.011. nacirāddhiraṇyavarṣaḥ patiṣyatīti/
tgt_original: 「此衣乃是天所著衣，從何而至？ 」大臣報曰： 「曾聞古王名曼陀多，七日之中天雨金寶，王今衣墮不久金來。

src_original: 172.011. rājā kathayati--bhavantaḥ,
tgt_original: 」王曰：

src_original: jyotiṣko gṛhapatirbhagavatā vyākṛto divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti/  172.012. idaṃ ca divyaṃ vastramākāśāt patitam/  172.013. sthāpayata/  172.013. tasyaivāgatasya dāsyāmīti/  172.013. te caivamālāpaṃ kurvanti,
tgt_original: 「我聞火生長者，佛與授記有人天妙相，此妙天衣從空而墮，待彼來至我當與之。

src_original: jyotiṣkaścāgataḥ/  172.014. rājā kathayati--kumāra,
tgt_original: 」火生既來，王言： 「童子！

src_original: tvaṃ bhagavatā vyākṛto divyamānuṣīṃ śriyaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti/  172.014. mama cedaṃ divyaṃ vastramākāśāt patitam/
tgt_original: 世尊記汝有人天妙相，此妙天衣從空而墮，爾可著之。

src_original: 172.015. gṛhāṇeti/  172.015. tena hastaḥ prasāritaḥ/
tgt_original: 」即便舒手受取王衣，得已審觀乃是已物，遂便微笑，白言： 「大王！ 王曾觸不？

src_original: 172.015. deva ānaya, paśyāmīti/
tgt_original: 」報言： 「已觸。 」白言：

src_original: 172.016. sa nirīkṣitumārabdho yāvat paśyatyātmīyaṃ snānaśāṭakam/
tgt_original: 「既捉鄙衣，宜可洗手。 此非天服，是臣浴衣。

src_original: madīyo 'yaṃ snānaśāṭako vāyunopakṣipta ihāgata iti/
tgt_original: 「餘有一衣與家人著，與此相似，王可驗之。 」王見是已極生希異，報言：

src_original: 172.017. kumāra, tava divyamānuṣyakī śrīḥ prādurbhūtā?
tgt_original: 「童子！ 汝今豈可人天妙相皆出現耶？ 」答言：

src_original: deva, prādurbhūtā/
tgt_original: 「已出。

src_original: 172.018. kumāra, yadyevam,  kimarthaṃ na nimantrayasi?
tgt_original: 」「若如是者，何不請我暫往舍中。

src_original: deva, nimantrito bhava/
tgt_original: 」「大王若許，今便奉請。 」王言：

src_original: 172.019. gaccha, bhaktaṃ sajjīkuru/
tgt_original: 「可去備辦飲食。

src_original: deva nāyaṃ roditi,
tgt_original: 「何因內人見我流淚？ 」答曰：

src_original: kiṃ tu devasya kāṣṭhadhūmena vastrāṇi dhūpitāni,  tena <173>āsāmaśrupato jāta iti/
tgt_original: 「非是啼泣，由王衣服栴檀沈水香烟所熏，烟氣損睛致使流淚。

src_original: 173.001. rājā tatra divyamānuṣyā śriyā upacaryamāṇaḥ pramatto na niṣkrāṃti/  173.002. rājakṛtyāni rājakariṇīyāni parihātumārabdhāni/
tgt_original: 」時影勝王受天妙樂殊勝難思，耽欲無厭不還宮內，國之機務悉皆棄捨。

src_original: 173.002. amātyairajātaśatruḥ kumāro 'bhibhūtah--kumāra,
tgt_original: 時諸大臣啟未生怨太子曰：

src_original: devo jyotiṣkasya gṛhaṃ praviśya pramattaḥ/
tgt_original: 「國主大王入火生長者所居之宅，耽著欲樂不肯還宮。

src_original: 173.003. gaccha, nivedayeti/
tgt_original: 唯願太子往白其事。

src_original: 173.003. tena gatvā uktah--deva,
tgt_original: 」時未生怨即至王所，白言： 「大天！
